Alan, Milt...
Hikone bori tsuba mei can be read Nobumichi saku
or Yoshimichi saku. In either case this mei is
unrecorded in the Kinko Jiten, Wakayama (rev. Heisei 11).

I'll try the fuchi mei tomorrow.

Cary Condell

San Francisco, CA 94159
